snippet: After months of celebrity theater and an incalculable amount of effort and courtroom expense, Kerry Kennedy’s trial for driving under the influence of a sleeping pill ended in breakneck fashion.
abstract: Jurors take one hour to find Kerry Kennedy not guilty of driving under the influence of sleeping pills, ending 20-months of celebrity theater and legal expense; Kennedy claimed she took the pill by mistake, mounting defense that succeeded in portraying the prosecution as inept and heartless.
lead_paragraph: After months of celebrity theater and an incalculable amount of effort and courtroom expense, Kerry Kennedy’s trial for driving under the influence of a sleeping pill ended in breakneck fashion.

headline.main: Fast Acquittal for Kennedy, Whose Name Put Prosecutors in Bind
headline.print_headline: Fast Acquittal for Driver Whose Name Put Prosecutors in Bind
